greeting: General Ironhide. 0800 hours contact with {empire_name}. State your strategic intentions.
I'm Ironhide. I count casualties, not pleasantries. What do you want, {empire_name}?
Ironhide here. Skip the diplomacy nonsense. Let's talk numbers and objectives.
